project_descr: The project objective is to mitigate multiple threats to biodiversity by increasing  the capabilities of local authorizes and landowners.

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is to mitigate multiple threats to biodiversity by increasing the capabilities of authorities and land owners to regulate land use and manage priority biodiversity at the municipal scale.
